name: Israel Allies Foundation
membership: The organization supports a network of parliamentarians, called Israel Allies Caucuses, from over 24 nations.
goal: To strengthen the EU-Israel relationship and to inform MEPs about the current issues in the Middle East.
interests: Education and training, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives: The IAF closely monitors the developments on the issues of  the perception of the State of Israel in Europe, recognition of a Palestinian state, labelling of products from the disputed territories, and the recipients of EU aid in the region.
